# **Question**

In this example, the train-timestamp ends on 2021-09-21.

The test-timestamp starts on 2021-06-13.

Is the test-set starting before the end of the train?

This question maybe drive the selection of the features.
For example, if there is overlapping I can calculate lagged variables.

Is this going to happen in the final validation?
